articles.title: Stokes and Botham discuss the future of cricket
articles.description: Ben Stokes speaks to Lord Botham about transforming Test cricket, their heroics at Headingley and opening up about mental health.
articles.content:
Ben Stokes and Ian Botham are two of England's greatest ever cricketers
They are two titans of English cricket - Ian Botham and Ben Stokes.
Stokes has revolutionised the way Test cricket is played … [+6386 chars]

articles.author: Alex Blair
articles.title: Aussies spend Boxing Day trashing Bradman
articles.description: Social media’s love affair with cancelling long-dead celebrities has reared its head again, this time with Australian cricket icon Don Bradman in the firing line.
articles.content:

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
